description:
In NovaException, there is code does a string format operation with kwargs passed into the constructor.

If the variable in the string don't match the kwargs, an exception will be raised, and any kwargs information will be lost.

I'm going to log the exception and the kwargs.
title: Kwargs info lost when String Format Operation fails in NovaException
